# Inline PlantUML test

Inline block (source in file):

```{.plantuml filename: "/images/FMHelloWorld.puml"}
%% directive-only
```

Inline block (directive inside):

```{.plantuml}
%%| filename: /images/FMHelloWorld.puml
```

Inline block (inline !include expansion):

```{.plantuml}
@startuml
!include /images/FMHelloWorld.puml
@enduml
```
